page.description: Copy the ResultSet to a string.
page.syntax: List as C = ToString([ RowsToCopy = -1 as N [, StartRow = -1 as N [, DisplayFormat = .t. as L [, ColumnSeparator as C [, RowSeparator as C, [, ReferenceColumns as SQL::TableInfo [, UserContext as P]]]]]])

argument.name: List
argument.description: A tab and CR-LF delimited list of fields and records.

argument.name: SQL::ResultSet
argument.description: A SQL::ResultSet object created with a DIM statement.

argument.name: RowsToCopy
argument.description: Optional. Default = -1 (all). The number of rows to copy.

argument.name: StartRow
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1 (first). The first row to copy.

argument.name: ReferenceColumns
argument.description: Optional. A SQL::TableInfo object. When data is formatted for a column in the result set: (1) if ReferenceColumns has a column with a matching name, that object will be used to format the data; (2) otherwise the ColumnInfo property of the result set is used to format the data.

argument.name: UserContext
argument.description: Optional. The user context is passed into the evaluation of the expression when data is formatted.

page.discussion: The ToString() method copies the SQL::ResultSet to a tab and CR-LF delimited list.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim rs as SQL::ResultSet dim connString as C dim select_exp as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v8\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" select_exp = "select * from customer where bill_state_region = 'ny'" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.execute(select_exp) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) conn.close() end end if rs = conn.ResultSet ui_msg_box("Results", rs.ToString()) conn.close()
